name: Patong Beach
description: Popular beach with vibrant nightlife and water activities.

name: Big Buddha
description: Massive Buddha statue with panoramic views of Phuket.

name: Phuket Old Town
description: Area known for Sino-Portuguese architecture and street art.

name: Wat Chalong
description: Largest and most important Buddhist temple in Phuket.

name: Phuket FantaSea
description: Cultural theme park with shows and dining.

name: Promthep Cape
description: Famous sunset viewpoint at the southern tip of Phuket.

name: Kata Beach
description: Scenic beach known for surfing and family-friendly environment.

name: Karon Viewpoint
description: Viewpoint offering panoramic views of Kata, Karon, and Kata Noi beaches.

name: Nai Harn Beach
description: Secluded beach popular among locals and tourists alike.

name: Phuket Aquarium
description: Aquarium with local marine life and conservation info.

name: Bangla Road
description: Famous nightlife street in Patong Beach.

name: Freedom Beach
description: Secluded beach accessible by boat or hike.

name: Surin Beach
description: Upscale beach with clear waters and nearby resorts.

name: Phuket Trickeye Museum
description: Interactive 3D art museum with optical illusions.

name: Laem Singh Viewpoint
description: Hidden viewpoint overlooking Laem Singh Beach.

name: Jungceylon Shopping Center
description: Large shopping complex in the heart of Patong.

name: Phuket Elephant Sanctuary
description: Ethical elephant sanctuary for retired elephants.

name: Tiger Kingdom Phuket
description: Tiger park where visitors can interact with tigers.

name: Baan Teelanka (Upside Down House)
description: Fun house with an upside-down design and maze garden.

name: Khao Rang Viewpoint
description: Popular hilltop viewpoint with city views and monkeys.
